pageContext.claim: “In a period of six months, since we started doing what I'm doing, the steel industry has literally revived. U.S. Steel is opening up eight plants.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of eight facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
